attributes.action: bestow upon graham kendrick an OBE for services to Christian worship music
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Graham kendrick is a talented singer/songwriter of British Christian Worship songs,enjoyed by thousands, with many CD's of original songs, who performs live concerts at subsidised cost around the country, glorifying our God

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
